entries.description: SAM template.yaml syntax support for condition, requestmodel, requestparameters, custom resources, SSMParameterReadPolicy and AWSSecretsManagerGetSecretValuePolicy
Fixed issue with API Gateway 'Invoke on AWS' resource names always showing 'resource.path'
S3 File Viewer: file paths containing reserved URI characters are now handled correctly
`Edit SAM Debug Configuration` and `View Toolkit Logs` commands are now shown in the AWS Explorer main menu
Lambda: Use Upload Lambda from a folder, template file, or the command palette.
renamed `SAM Debug Configuration Editor` command to `Edit SAM Debug Configuration`
SAM run/debug now uses the current active credentials (if the `aws.credentials` launch-config field is not set)
Show "Add Debug Config" codelens in JS/TS files even if package.json is missing #2579
"Show or Hide Regions" is now one command that supports multiple selections
added `Show AWS Commands...` command to AWS Explorer menu
Open schemas directly when clicking on schema item nodes
